MONUMENT_ARCANUM_AETHER_COURT.MONUMENT_ARCANUM_AETHER_COURT_DESC: A center dedicated to the arcane arts with buildings both for general study and specialized fields, including towers, groves and sanctums.

PROGRESS_TIER_ARCANUM_T1.PROGRESS_TIER_ARCANUM_T1_DESC: Rumours about a new Aether Court start to spread.

PROGRESS_TIER_ARCANUM_T2.PROGRESS_TIER_ARCANUM_T2_DESC: Scholars have started talking about your research.

PROGRESS_TIER_ARCANUM_T3.PROGRESS_TIER_ARCANUM_T3_DESC: Third tier in the Arcanum Estate progress tree.

PROGRESS_TIER_ARCANUM_T4.PROGRESS_TIER_ARCANUM_T4_DESC: Fourth tier in the Arcanum Estate progress tree.

PROGRESS_TIER_ARCANUM_T5.PROGRESS_TIER_ARCANUM_T5_DESC: Fifth tier in the Arcanum Estate progress tree.

UNLOCKABLE_ARCANUM_AETHER_COURT.UNLOCKABLE_ARCANUM_AETHER_COURT_DESC: Unlocks the Aether Court monument, which lets you delve into magic.

UNLOCKABLE_ARCANUM_AETHER_COURT_TREASURY.UNLOCKABLE_ARCANUM_AETHER_COURT_TREASURY: Unlocks the Treasury for your Aether Court.

JOB_RESEARCHER.JOB_RESEARCHER_DESC: Researches the science and fundamentals of magic.
